context: As part of a security incident involving suspicious system hardware discovery on 2024-07-04, a file `svchost.exe` was executed with the command line `svchost.exe -k netsvcs -p -s winmgmt` and had a Process ID of 2880. Furthermore, a PowerShell script named `contosoadfsblatempcreds.ps1` was executed from `c:\script\`, associated with user ID `2de70991-2799-4a95-b734-8e3df3a50118` and was part of a user `pwilson` session. Attackers might be trying to gather information about the target device or network for later attacks.
question: During the suspicious sequence of exploration activities, which executable file was used to run the windows commands, and when was it executed?
solution_steps: A suspicious system hardware discovery was made using the process `powershell.exe`.
A suspicious sequence of exploration activities was performed using the process `whoami.exe` with Process ID `13812`, created on `2024-07-02t09:47:29.6970346z`.
